title: Generous Government Subsidies
description: In 2022, Belgium allocated 84.99% of its expenses to subsidies and other transfers, showcasing one of the highest proportions globally.

title: High Density of Nurses and Midwives
description: With 20.89 nurses and midwives per 1,000 people in 2022, Belgium ranks among the top countries for healthcare personnel density.

title: Low Prevalence of Underweight Children
description: In 2023, only 0.3% of children under five in Belgium were underweight, indicating one of the lowest rates globally.

title: Minimal Child Wasting Rates
description: Belgium recorded a mere 0.2% prevalence of wasting among male children under five in 2023, reflecting one of the lowest rates worldwide.

title: Low Early Marriage Rates for Women
description: In 2020, only 0.1% of Belgian women aged 20-24 were married by age 18, one of the lowest rates globally.
